item.title: Werid error when launching server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Nicksworld, post:6, topic:545871”]character-height = 4
character-posx = 3087
character-posy = 3499[/quote]
That’s your issue.
Change the height level to 0. Tell me if it works.

item.title: Werid error when launching server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Looks like your player is in a spot your region def doesn’t support so when trying to walk or get his position it comes up as a null.

Pro tip: if the height is below -1 in height, just add 4 to it.
Ex: if the heightlevel is -3, the same map data will be on heightlevel 1.

Read full topic
